scripts.podCleaner: cd ios; pod deintegrate; rm -rf Podfile.lock; cd .. ; yarn pod_installer
scripts.android_bundle_production: cd android; ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && cd app/build/outputs/bundle/productionRelease && cp -R ./ ~/Desktop && cd ~/Desktop && open .;
scripts.android_bundle_staging: yarn shotFlipperAway; cd android; ./gradlew bundleStagingRelease && cd app/build/outputs/bundle/stagingRelease && cp -R ./ ~/Desktop && cd ~/Desktop && open .;
scripts.release_build_android_staging: yarn shotFlipperAway; cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && cd app/build/outputs/apk/staging/release && cp -R ./ ~/Desktop && cd ~/Desktop && open .;
scripts.release_build_android_production: cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && cd app/build/outputs/apk/production/release && cp -R ./ ~/Desktop && cd ~/Desktop && open .;
scripts.assembleRelease: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ..
scripts.installLibs: yarn add @react-native-async-storage/async-storage @react-native-community/masked-view @react-navigation/bottom-tabs @react-navigation/native @react-navigation/stack react-native-gesture-handler react-native-reanimated react-native-safe-area-context react-native-screens react-native-elements react-native-vector-icons react-redux redux redux-devtools-extension redux-logger redux-persist redux-saga
